channel.title: Comments on: Tarzan’s Dad at the Hickman Trial

item.title: By: callboxsam
item.dc:creator: callboxsam
item.description: <div class="comment_body"><div>The confession signed by Edward Hickman is on display at the LAPD Historical Society Museum. The framed confession hung in Central Station for many years and almost went into the trash because of buffoonery. It was saved only by two people caring about the history of the LAPD.</div></div>
item.content:encoded: The confession signed by Edward Hickman is on display at the LAPD Historical Society Museum. The framed confession hung in Central Station for many years and almost went into the trash because of buffoonery. It was saved only by two people caring about the history of the LAPD.

item.title: By: pavilion130
item.dc:creator: pavilion130
item.description: <div class="comment_body"><div>Thanks for the info about the Hickman confession. Do you know if any other artifacts still exist, for example, the D.A. investigation files?</div></div>
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the info about the Hickman confession. Do you know if any other artifacts still exist, for example, the D.A. investigation files?
